name: RetroCube
description:
RetroCube is a unique puzzle action platformer. Swipe to jump from platform to platform while solving simple puzzles and defeating evil geometry in intense retro action! Play at your own pace, or race through the levels to compete for the fastest time.


LIGHT PUZZLE ELEMENTS
Puzzles are not overly complicated or frustrating and require skillful dexterity instead of deep thought to solve.


MINIGAMES AND BOSS FIGHTS
Enjoy 4 familiar game concepts featured as minigames within the progression of RetroCube. Battle 4 unique bosses using unique controls and vanquish evil geometry.


GREAT REPLAY VALUE
Race through every level in Speedrun mode and compete for the fastest time on Game Center. Attempt familiar yet brutal challenges in the intensified Hardcore mode. Can you beat my fastest time?


==============
FEATURES
==============

- 60 levels
- Simple one-handed controls
- 4 minigames and 4 unique boss fights
- Speedrun mode
- Hardcore mode - 60 intensified levels
- Awesome soundtrack and sound effects
- Game Center - compete for the fastest times


Give it a try - its free and has small file size!
This game is compatible with any device running iOS 8 or higher.
